verse: These three men stopped answering Job. This is because Job was so sure he was right.
But Elihu son of Barakel the Buzite became very angry with Job. (Elihu was from the family of Ram.) He was angry because Job claimed he was right instead of God.

Now Elihu had waited before speaking to Job. This is because the three friends were older than he was.
But when Elihu saw that the three men had nothing more to say, he became very angry.
